00023 /*
00024 typedef struct{
00025   double energy,wgt,y,yp;
00026   double x,xp;

00029 typedef struct{

00033 
00034 using std::vector;
00035 
00036 typedef vector<BDSParticle*> vPART;
00037 typedef vector<BDSRMatrix*> vRMAT;
00038 typedef vector<G4double> vZpos;
00039 
00040 class BDSExtractBunch
00041 {
00042 
00043 public:
00044 
00045   BDSExtractBunch (char* ExtractBunchInputFilename);
00046   
00047   ~BDSExtractBunch();
00048 
00049   void bunch_make(int n_bunch,int n_slice,int n_macro,int n_field);
00050   
00051   void read_beam_file(char *name,int ibunch0);
00052 
00053 protected:
00054   //  void BuildSectorBendMaterial();
00055 
00056 
00057 public:
00058   int GetNumSlices();
00059   int GetNumBunches();
00060   int GetNumSlicesPerBunch();
00061   int GetNumMacroparticles();
00062   vZpos* GetZPos();
00063 
00064   /*
00065   PARTICLE* GetParticle();
00066   R_MATRIX* GetSigma();
00067   R_MATRIX* GetSigmaXX();
00068   R_MATRIX* GetSigmaXY();
00069   */
00070 
00071   vPART* GetParticleVector();
00072   vRMAT* GetSigmaVector();
00073   vRMAT* GetSigmaXXVector();
00074   vRMAT* GetSigmaXYVector();
00075 
00076 private:
00077 
00078   int slices_per_bunch,macroparticles,bunches;
00079   int slices,n_field,which_field;
00080   double factor,transv_factor;
00081   //  PARTICLE *particle;
00082   //  R_MATRIX *sigma,*sigma_xx,*sigma_xy;
00083   vPART *partVec;
00084   vRMAT *sigmaVec,*sigma_xxVec,*sigma_xyVec;
00085   vZpos *z_position;
00086 };
00087 
00088 inline int BDSExtractBunch::GetNumSlices()
00089 {return slices;};
00090 
00091 inline  int BDSExtractBunch::GetNumBunches()
00092 {return bunches;};
00093 
00094 inline  int BDSExtractBunch::GetNumSlicesPerBunch()
00095 {return slices_per_bunch;};
00096 
00097 inline  int BDSExtractBunch::GetNumMacroparticles()
00098 {return macroparticles;};
00099 
00100 inline  vZpos* BDSExtractBunch::GetZPos()
00101 {return z_position;};
00102 
00103 /*
00104 inline  PARTICLE* BDSExtractBunch::GetParticle()
00105 {return particle;};
00106 
00107 inline  R_MATRIX* BDSExtractBunch::GetSigma()
00108 {return sigma;};
00109 
00110 inline R_MATRIX* BDSExtractBunch::GetSigmaXX()
00111 {return sigma_xx;};
00112 
00113 inline  R_MATRIX* BDSExtractBunch::GetSigmaXY()
00114 {return sigma_xy;};
00115 */
00116 
00117 inline  vPART* BDSExtractBunch::GetParticleVector()
00118 {return partVec;};
00119 
00120 inline  vRMAT* BDSExtractBunch::GetSigmaVector()
00121 {return sigmaVec;};
00122 
00123 inline vRMAT* BDSExtractBunch::GetSigmaXXVector()
00124 {return sigma_xxVec;};
00125 
00126 inline vRMAT* BDSExtractBunch::GetSigmaXYVector()
00127 {return sigma_xyVec;};
